doc.field: Series IV. Advertising Promotion Department Records
Series IV. Advertising Promotion Department Records
Time Inc. Sports Illustrated Publishing and Business Records
Time Inc. Sports Illustrated Publishing and Business Records
Subseries IV.D. Press Information Office Files
Subseries IV.D. Press Information Office Files

The Press Information Office Files contain press releases, photograph files, and weekly reports to the advertising sales staff. The press releases promote sports figure interviews in Sports Illustrated (SI) and other articles, announce SI staffing changes, and report on sports news. Photographs sometimes accompany the press releases. The photograph files contain photographic material of people or events similar to that found in the press release files. Weekly reports include tentative information on issue contents and covers.
Files for 1973 and 1974 January to April were not found.
